PPRN.Enabled.Name: Enable Player Pronouns
PPRN.Enabled.Hint: This allows you to manually add your own pronoun on the player configuration.
PPRN.ShowPlayerList.Name: Show Pronoun in Player List
PPRN.ShowPlayerList.Hint: This will add the entered pronoun after the player name, but before the character name in the Player List
PPRN.Heading: Player Pronoun
